midPane.h5: Inferred biomass biogeochemical model of Mystic Lake.
midPane.div: by Scott W Olesen, Sarah P Preheim, and Eric J Alm

DESCRIPTION
Mystic is a Matlab program (with supporting Python scripts) that runs a conceptual, quantitative simulation of the biogeochemistry of Mystic Lake, a polluted, dimictic lake outside Boston. The model was designed to predict the overall vertical spatial distribution of major chemical species and microbial metabolisms in the lake.
REFERENCE
Sarah P. Preheim, Scott W. Olesen, Sarah J. Spencer, Arne Materna, Charuleka Varadharajan, Matthew Blackburn, Jonathan Friedman, Jorge Rodr√≠guez, Harold Hemond and Eric J. Alm. Surveys, simulation and single-cell assays relate function and phylogeny in a lake ecosystem. Nature Microbiology (2016) doi:10.1038/nmicrobiol.2016.130
